search_term: Find the official pricing page URL for Ecologi (ecologi.com). Only provide the exact URL to the pricing page, not a summary of pricing information.
response_text: The official pricing page for Ecologi can be found at: [https://ecologi.com/pricing](https://ecologi.com/pricing)【3:0†source】.

Your plan | Ecologi
===============

[No More _Excuses_](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=lz9-1fDGT9M). Watch our witty take on the barriers we know business face everyday 👀

Welcome👋
---------

[Home](https://ecologi.com/)

Solutions

[For large businesses over 50 employees](https://ecologi.com/solutions/for-large-businesses)

[For small businesses under 50 employees](https://ecologi.com/solutions/for-small-businesses)

[Transparency](https://ecologi.com/why-ecologi/trust-through-transparency)

Our impact

[Climate projects](https://ecologi.com/projects)

Resources

[Blog](https://ecologi.com/articles)

[Help centre](https://help.ecologi.com/)

[Webinars](https://ecologi.com/resources/webinars)

[Sign in 🌿](https://ecologi.com/api/login)

[Get started](https://ecologi.com/solutions)

[Speak to the team](https://ecologi.com/page/schedule-a-call)

[![Image 1](https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/lipis/flag-icons/flags/4x3/gb.svg)](https://ecologi.com/plan#switch-region)

[](https://ecologi.com/ "Go to the Ecologi homepage")

[](https://ecologi.com/ "Go to the home page")

Select your monthly plan
========================

Plant trees and fund carbon avoidance
-------------------------------------

[Looking for Ecologi for Business?](https://ecologi.com/business/checkout)

Personal plansFamily plan

### Ultimate

£18.80/month

Double your positive impact for the planet with this plan.

[8 trees funded](https://ecologi.com/projects)

every month

16 tonnes CO2

avoided every year

(~2x footprint\*)

Choose plan

### Essential

£9.40/month

The perfect plan to help you give back to the planet.

[4 trees funded](https://ecologi.com/projects)

every month

8 tonnes CO2

avoided every year

(~1x footprint\*)

Choose plan

### Starter

£4.70/month

Take your first steps into climate action with this plan.

[2 trees funded](https://ecologi.com/projects)

every month

2.64 tonnes CO2

avoided every year

(~1/3x footprint\*)

Choose plan

\* Footprints are for illustrative purposes only. At Ecologi, we believe that funding climate solutions is vital, but it doesn't diminish your own carbon emissions - and should therefore be carried out alongside steps you take to reduce your own footprint. As part of your subscription, we will fund the prevention or avoidance of approximately 1/3 (Starter), 1 (Essential) or 2 (Ultimate) footprints' worth of carbon emissions, during each year you're subscribed.

Add a local project to your monthly plan
----------------------------------------

### Plant extra trees in the UK

Bring the impact closer to home by supporting a tree planting project in the UK.

Read more about our UK tree planting projects

UK tree

£5.00 / month

Number of local trees

Number of local trees

0

Special tile in your forest

Returning mining, logging, and agricultural land to balance

Updates & news from the project

Go to checkout

pricing_data.pricing_notes: Pricing is based on monthly subscription plans with varying levels of environmental impact.

pricing_tiers.tier_description: Take your first steps into climate action with this plan.
features: 2.64 tonnes CO2 avoided every year (~1/3x footprint)
